gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.descriptors
Class TranslatableBoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T,R,L>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.descriptors.TranslatableBoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T,R,L>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of descriptor.
R - Type of translation resource id.
L - Type of language id.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Labeled, Named, BoPropertyDescriptor<T>, BoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T>, Serializable
public class TranslatableBoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T,R,L>
extends Object
implements BoPropertyDescriptor<T>, BoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T>

Wrapper around a BoPropertyDescriptor that allows the caption to change.

See Also:
Serialized Form
